info.author: Stephan Jorek
info.description:
Pygments Inject Filter
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Pygments Inject Filter package plugs filters into the Pygments syntax
highlighting package written in Python.

It provides filters, eg. to inject `Linenumber` and generic `Segment…`-tokens
into the stream.

Install the `Pygments Inject Filter tip`_ via ``easy_install Pygments-Inject-Filter==dev``.

.. _Pygments Inject Filter tip:
   http://bitbucket.org/sjorek/pygments-inject-filter/get/tip.zip#egg=Pygments-Inject-Filter-dev

:copyright: Copyright 2013 Stephan Jorek
:license: BSD, see LICENSE for details.
